cross.datastructures.workflow
Class DefaultWorkflow

java.lang.Object
  cross.datastructures.workflow.DefaultWorkflow
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWorkflow, IEventSource<IWorkflowResult>, IConfigurable, IXMLSerializable
public class DefaultWorkflow
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWorkflow, IXMLSerializable

A default implementation of IWorkflow. Is a source of IEvent events.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
